sense.definition: indicating the physical starting point, as of movement or extension (e.g., travel from Maine, a rope from the front to the back)
indicating the vantage point (e.g., see from the tower)
indicating the location where someone/something who is communicating is at (e.g., he called from the lobby)
indicating the origin of an entity or object, as of where it/they came into existence or developed (e.g., people from Britain)
indicating the location associated with someone/something, as of where someone/something was originally or is generally encountered (e.g., friends from school)
so as to be or become (non-physically) separated, unassociated with, or not in accordance with (e.g., defect from the party)
indicating a previous state or condition (e.g., recovered from illness)
indicating the creator or performer of something (e.g., criticism from Joe)
indicating the cause of something (e.g., was cold from the wind)
indicating an input used in a creative process (e.g., made from recycled paper)
indicating a source of knowledge or basis for judgment (e.g., concluded from his remarks)
indicating the source of obtainment (e.g., I bought it from Joe)
indicating the starting point along a particular scale or range (e.g., rose from $5)
indicating the starting point in time (e.g., from January onward)
indicating something against which a distinction/difference is made or perceived (e.g., distinguish old from new)
indicating something that is avoided (e.g., abstain from drugs)
